snippet.title: Malus Alpha Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Malus is an Isometric Action Role Playing Game with an emphasis on horror, combat and gameplay. The game is much slower paced than your typical ARPG. Malus features a soft-lock on mechanic and a bonfire type saving system, where, when you die, you lose your items and start from your last saved "bonfire".


Consider supporting our crowdfunding campaign at
https://igg.me/at/malusRPG


Click here to visit our Steam Page
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1254400/Malus/


Visit our website for more details
http://www.projectmalus.com
